00028 #ifndef __OptimisedUtil_H__
00029 #define __OptimisedUtil_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreEdgeListBuilder.h"
00033 #include <cstddef>
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00047     class _OgreExport OptimisedUtil
00048     {
00049     private:
00051         OptimisedUtil(const OptimisedUtil& rhs); /* do nothing, should not use */
00053         OptimisedUtil& operator=(const OptimisedUtil& rhs); /* do not use */
00054 
00055     protected:
00057         static OptimisedUtil* msImplementation;
00058 
00060         static OptimisedUtil* _detectImplementation(void);
00061 
00062     public:
00063         // Default constructor
00064         OptimisedUtil(void) {}
00065         // Destructor
00066         virtual ~OptimisedUtil() {}
00067 
00073         static OptimisedUtil* getImplementation(void) { return msImplementation; }
00074 
00099         virtual void softwareVertexSkinning(
00100             const float *srcPosPtr, float *destPosPtr,
00101             const float *srcNormPtr, float *destNormPtr,
00102             const float *blendWeightPtr, const unsigned char* blendIndexPtr,
00103             const Matrix4* const* blendMatrices,
00104             size_t srcPosStride, size_t destPosStride,
00105             size_t srcNormStride, size_t destNormStride,
00106             size_t blendWeightStride, size_t blendIndexStride,
00107             size_t numWeightsPerVertex,
00108             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00109 
00123         virtual void softwareVertexMorph(
00124             Real t,
00125             const float *srcPos1, const float *srcPos2,
00126             float *dstPos,
00127             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00128 
00138         virtual void concatenateAffineMatrices(
00139             const Matrix4& baseMatrix,
00140             const Matrix4* srcMatrices,
00141             Matrix4* dstMatrices,
00142             size_t numMatrices) = 0;
00143 
00155         virtual void calculateFaceNormals(
00156             const float *positions,
00157             const EdgeData::Triangle *triangles,
00158             Vector4 *faceNormals,
00159             size_t numTriangles) = 0;
00160 
00177         virtual void calculateLightFacing(
00178             const Vector4& lightPos,
00179             const Vector4* faceNormals,
00180             char* lightFacings,
00181             size_t numFaces) = 0;
00182 
00197         virtual void extrudeVertices(
00198             const Vector4& lightPos,
00199             Real extrudeDist,
00200             const float* srcPositions,
00201             float* destPositions,
00202             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00203     };
00204 
00209     template <class T>
00210     static FORCEINLINE T* rawOffsetPointer(T* ptr, ptrdiff_t offset)
00211     {
00212         return (T*)((char*)(ptr) + offset);
00213     }
00214 
00219     template <class T>
00220     static FORCEINLINE void advanceRawPointer(T*& ptr, ptrdiff_t offset)
00221     {
00222         ptr = rawOffsetPointer(ptr, offset);
00223     }
00227 }
